scripts.dist: npm run build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const distDir = 'dist/pasteImages'; fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.mkdirSync(distDir, { recursive: true }); ['manifest.json', 'main.js', 'styles.css'].forEach(file => fs.copyFileSync(file, path.join(distDir, file))); console.log('Distribution folder created at dist/pasteImages');"
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
